description: This file defines a Flutter widget for creating and editing calendar events. It includes a form with input fields for title, description, date, time, and color/category selection. It manages stateful interactions for picking dates and times, and it interacts with an external event store to add or update events.

classes.name: EventFormScreen
classes.description: A Flutter screen widget for adding or editing an event, managing form state and user interactions.

classes.name: _EventFormScreenState
classes.description: State class managing the form data, input validation, and interaction logic for EventFormScreen.

methods.name: initState
methods.description: Initializes the state with existing event data if editing, or defaults if creating a new event.

methods.name: build
methods.description: Builds the UI for the event form screen, including the app bar and form content.

methods.name: _buildForm
methods.description: Constructs the form widget with input fields and action buttons.

methods.name: _pickDate
methods.description: Displays a date picker dialog for selecting the event date.

methods.name: _pickStart
methods.description: Displays a time picker for selecting the start time of the event.

methods.name: _pickEnd
methods.description: Displays a time picker for selecting the end time of the event.

methods.name: _save
methods.description: Validates and saves the event data to the event store, either adding or updating an event.

methods.name: _strip
methods.description: Removes time components from a DateTime, keeping only the date parts.

methods.name: _fmtDate
methods.description: Formats a DateTime into a user-friendly date string.

methods.name: _fmtTime
methods.description: Formats a TimeOfDay into a string with AM/PM notation.
